snippet: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority has hired Robert Colby, a former top federal regulator, as its general counsel, a person briefed on the matter said. Mr. Colby will join Finra from Davis Polk.
abstract: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority has hired Robert Colby, a former top federal regulator, as its general counsel, a person briefed on the matter said. Mr. Colby will join Finra from Davis Polk.
